title: Research Library Website (2018/2019)
description: This aims to be the school's main portal for repository of student researches across Senior High Department. Students can upload their research to the website and also access other student researches

title: Hotel Reservation System (2021)
description: This is a platform wherein customers can book room accommodation for leisure purposes.

title: Cheese Chat Room Application (2022)
description: A simple chat room application. Users can create chat rooms, public or private, and share the link of that room.

title: MusicLink (2022)
description: A platform for amateur musicians who's struggling to gain listeners. The platform aims to help musicians to gain network and listeners.

title: Faculty Management System (2022)
description: For managing faculties and their subjects, researches, and extension services.

title: ENVote: An Online Voting System for Student Government Elections of Bulacan Polytechnic College (2022)
description: An online voting system platform for SG and SSG elections of Bulacan Polytechnic College. Users can vote with ease using their own devices, and can see candidatesâ€™ platforms before voting. After the election, results are displayed.

title: Capstone Titles Evaluation System (2023)
description: Evaluation system for capstone title proposal of capstone groups. The system should determine which capstone title a group should persue among the 3 titles submitted
